| Variable | Typical value used for a back‑of‑the‑envelope calculation |

| **Coal‑related death rate** | 30 deaths / TWh (mid‑point of the WHO/IEA range cited earlier). |
| **Nuclear‑related death rate** | 0.05 deaths / TWh (mid‑point of the 0.02‑0.15 deaths/TWh range). |

### 1.1  Simple arithmetic  

| Source | Deaths per year = (deaths / TWh) × (annual TWh) |
|-------|---------------------------------------------------|
